item.Name: auto buy#this item is automatically given to the player when they meet the conditions
default#this item will appear as 'worn' when the player isn't wearing any item (for 'default' items)
doesn't count toward percent complete#this item will NOT count toward an overall completion value
doesn't count toward new items#this item is never 'new'
lsp_authoritative#cannot be purchased locally, only LSP can set

_field_string_id.name: commendation id^#This must match one of the commendation names.

_field_char_integer.name: minimum level#This field is ignored if 'type' is set to 'aggregator'.

_field_char_enum.name: model_region#See player customization globals, linked from globals.globals.

_field_string_id.name: model_customization_selection_name^#This must match one of the selections in the model customization globals (within the selected region).
